Text:
bad software in my opinion.
the detection algois crap..
sometimes it works properly and other times it says partitions are NOT aligned when they are.

I use Paragon's Alignment Tool instead
and so far it has a perfect detection ratio.

don't believe me ? then wait until it fucks up one your partitions lol

This FTP has WD align as well
ftp://ftp.css.com.ua/pub/drivers/HDD/WD/AcronisAlignTool_s_e_2_0_111.exe
